documents.document: You may lose the people you love, You may lose the things you have. But no matter what happens, Never lose yourself!
Live every day like it's your last, because one day it will be, and you'll look back on all the things you wish you had done.
Just because you can't see the air doesn't mean you stop breathing. And just because you can't see God doesn't mean you stop believing.
Life is too short to worry about haters. They don't deserve to be an issue in your life. Think about the people who love and support you.
When something bad happens, you have 3 choices: You can either let it define you, destroy you, or let it strengthen you.
Never give up, not because you still have tomorrow to try, but because you may not have tomorrow to try.
Just because a person smiles all the time doesn't mean their life is perfect. That smile is a symbol of hope & strength.
Believe in yourself and create your own destiny. Don't fear failure!
Spend life with the people who make you happy, not the people who you have to impress.
Believe in yourself, push your limits, and do whatever it takes to conquer your goals.
Grudges are a waste of perfect happiness. Laugh when you can, apologize when you should, and let go of what you can't change.
Use your smile to change this world. Don't let this world change your smile.
Life doesn't let you to go back and change things. All you can do is learn from the past, and prepare for what the future may bring.
What hurts you today makes you stronger tomorrow.
Don't give up just because things are hard.
Every struggle in your past has shaped you into the person you are today. Take God's hand and step into your future without fear.
It does not matter how many times you get knocked down, but how many times you get up.
Anyone can make you smile, many people can make you cry, but it takes someone special to make you smile with tears in your eyes.
God gave you this life because he knew you were strong enough to live it.
Success isn't something given, it's something earned. So go out there, work hard, and make your dreams come true!
When you focus on problems, you'll have more problems. When you focus on possibilities, you'll have more opportunities.
Respect isn't something that's given. It's earned.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
A few tears won't kill you, only heal you. A little pain won't destroy you, only strengthen you. So cry, forgive, and move on.
Success is a journey, not a destination. The process is often more important than the outcome.
Find a heart that will love you at your worst, and arms that will hold you at your weakest.
Start each day with a new hope, leave bad memories behind and have faith for a better tomorrow.
Your past is done, so forget it, your future is yet to come, so dream it, but your present is now, so live it with no regrets!
Judge nothing, you will be happy. Forgive everything, you will be happier. Love everything, you will be happiest.
Today is the oldest you've ever been, and the youngest you'll ever be again. So live life to the fullest today, and have no regrets.
God has perfect timing; never early, never late. It takes a little patience and it takes a lot of faith but it's worth the wait.
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
Smile for what you have, rather than cry for what you don't.
A positive attitude gives you power over your circumstances instead of your circumstances having power over you.
Sometimes silence is the best answer.
Don't be afraid of change. You may end up losing something good, but you will probably end up gaining something better.
Good things come to those who believe, Better things come to those who wait and the Best things come to those who don't give up.
God, please give us the courage to accept things for what they are, but to never lose hope that things will always get better.
Don't get stuck on the one thing that ruins your day. Smile and be happy. Life is too short to waste on negativity.
A good life is when you smile often, dream big, laugh a lot and realize how blessed you are for what you have.
Sometimes you have to stop worrying & doubting. Have faith that things will work out. Maybe not how you planned but the way it's meant to be
Knowing when to walk away, is wisdom. Being able to, is courage. Walking away with your head held high, is dignity.
Over-thinking ruins you. Ruins the situation, twists things around, makes you worry and just makes everything much worse than it actually is
People will hate you, rate you, shake you, and break you. But how strong you stand is what makes you.
https://t.co/lqEiehGLE4
When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.
It's easier to go down a hill than up it but the view is much better at the top.
Life is too short to worry about what others say or think about you. So have fun and give them something to talk about.
Stop running away from your problems because that only increases the distance from the solution. Make it right today, tomorrow is too late.
The secret of success: stop wishing, start doing.
Sometimes you need patience in order to find true happiness. It won't come fast and it won't come easy, but it will be worth it.
We can smile even though we are hurting and we can feel happy even though we are unhappy. It's called strength.
God, please give us the courage to accept things for what they are, but to never lose hope that things will always get better.
The only time you should ever look back, is to see how far you've come.
A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it. A stupid person makes it.
Smile. Let everyone know that today you're a lot stronger than you were yesterday.
The best revenge is to move on and get over it. Don't give someone the satisfaction of watching you suffer.
Keep smiling and enjoy the journey even when it's like there's no hope at all. Everything will be alright.
Sometimes you face difficulties not because you're doing something wrong, But because you're doing something right.
Appreciate those who love you. Help those who need you. Forgive those who hurt you. Forget those who leave you.
Life is full of fake people. Before you decide to judge them, make sure you're not one of them.
Sometimes it takes the worst pain to bring about the best change.
Life is too short to worry about what others say or think about you. So have fun and give them something to talk about.
Respect people's feelings. Even if it doesn't mean anything to you, it could mean everything to them.
The life you have left is a gift. Cherish it. Enjoy it now, to the fullest. Do what you want most.
You can't change the Past, but you can do something to change the Present & Future. Live the way you want, and have no regrets.
You were born to be real, not to be perfect. You are here to be you, not to live someone else's life.
You have to hurt in order to know. Fall in order to grow. Lose in order to gain. Because many of life's lessons are learned in pain.
In life, many things don't go according to plan. If you fall, get back up. If you stumble, re-gain your balance. Never give up.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
1) Work your hardest 2) Dream your biggest 3) Be your greatest
As we grow up, we realize it becomes less important to have a ton of friends, and more important to have real ones.
Never let your memories be greater than your dreams.
To everyone going through any struggle or pain right now, keep your head up, and keep on smiling, you'll get through it.
Stop beating yourself up. You are a work in progress; which means you get there a little at a time, not all at once.
Sometimes silence is the best answer.
God knew you were going to be special to someone..that's why he created you. Be happy with yourself, and know you are loved.
Do not cry for the past is gone, do not stress about the future has not arrived, live in the present and make it awesome.
Before you talk, listen. Before you react, think. Before you criticize, wait. Before you pray, forgive. Before you quit, try.
A negative mind will never give you a positive life.
Don't start your day with the broken pieces of yesterday. Every morning we wake up is the first day of the rest of our life.
Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, 'What's in it for me?'
You can't be good enough for everybody, but you'll always be the best for the one who deserves you.
Life is too precious to stress yourself out by worrying about everything. Relax, have fun, and enjoy the learning process.
Challenges are what makes life interesting, overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
When you stop chasing the wrong things, you give the right things a chance to catch you.
Be strong now, because it will get better. It may be stormy now, but it can't rain forever.
The hard work you're putting in now will be worth it in the long run.
Head up, stay strong. Fake a smile, move on.
Disappointments are just God's way of saying: "I've got something better"' Be patient, live life, have faith.
In this world, there's always going to be people who are better then you. So stop comparing yourself to others, and just be the best you.
Always remember: you're braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Choose your friends with caution, plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
I'd rather live my life knowing that I'm not perfect, than spending my whole life pretending to be.
Happy are they who take life day by day, complain very little, and are thankful for the little things in life.
Anyone can give up, it's the easiest thing ever. But to hold it together when everyone else thinks you'd fall apart is true strength.
Pain makes you stronger, tears make you braver, and heartbreaks make you wiser, so thank the past for a better future.
Use your smile to change this world. Don't let this world change your smile.
Concentrate on your strengths instead of your weaknesses, on your powers instead of your problems.
Try not to become a man of success, but rather a man of value.
